thread.title: Translation Pal

author: Translation Pal
title: Translation Pal
text: We just completed the largest translation project in our company's young history, and the project required multiple translators in order to meet our client's tight deadline. ProofreadingPal was able to piece together the sections from the different translators into a single document. In addition to proofreading the translation for spelling, grammar, and punctuation errors, they were able to ensure consistent formatting throughout.
